title: Casita Ecovegana de Zihuatanejo Cooperativa
typeOfFood: Vegan, Pizza, Organic, Fast food, Salad bar, Juice bar, Delivery, Take-out, Mexican, Bakery, Catering
description: Serves all-vegan food, including light breakfast Mon-Fri; meals Tue-Thur. Banqueting service, special meals on request, bulk materials. Uses 90% local and organic ingredients.
